Texts.Chs: 助长计划进展顺利。这些耳廓狐是具有高度适应性的快速学习者，尽管他们显示出缺乏使用星际标准语言的能力。这无疑是由于他们的语言器官是的运作机理，而不是他们自己的问题。
Texts.Eng: Uplifting is going well. These Fenerox are highly adaptable and fast learners, though they do show a lack of capacity for using the galactic standard tongue. This is undoubtedly due to how their speech organs operate, and no fault of their own.

Texts.Chs: 我们已经试图创造适合他们修改版语言，他们可以使用至少近似元音和辅音的发音。 然而，尽管如此，他们似乎没有什么能力写下这门语言。他们更喜欢用手势而不是符号
Texts.Eng: We've attempted to create a modified version that they can use to at least approximate the vowel and consonant sounds. Despite all of this, however, they appear to have very little capability for writing the language down. They prefer to use hand gestures to 'sign'

Texts.Chs: 因为写字太枯燥，而且要花很长时间才能弄明白。
Texts.Eng: it was too boring and took too long to figure out.

Texts.Chs: 他们边说边写，无论教他们多少字母，都会引起他们的怀疑或恼怒。他们的动作非常敏捷，而写字（据他们说）则需要太长的时间。有一个孩子甚至说，等他学会写字的时候，他已经是白发苍苍的老人了，
Texts.Eng: their words as they speak, and any amount of teaching them letters is met with doubt or annoyance. They move very swiftly, and writing (according to them) takes entirely too long. One even mentioned that he would be old and grey by the time he learned to write, because
